system.name: Accessorize
system.effect: You may wear and benefit from two Accessory Slot Items at once. The two items must be of different types and must not share an effect. For example, a Fire Brace cannot be paired with another Fire Brace or a Fire Plate, but it could be paired with an Ice Brace, a Fire Booster, or a Stat Booster.
system.prerequisites: Dashing Makeover, one Fashionista Skill at Adept
